caption:
Treat yourself to the smoothest shave routine this Halloween👻✨ 

Your 3-step guide to silky, glowing skin:

Step 1: Start with 24k Gold Black Soap 🖤✨ for a deep, purifying cleanse that preps your skin for the smoothest shave.

Step 2: Apply Soft Serve Shave Butter 🍦🪒 — our creamy, ultra-luxe formula, giving you a close shave with zero irritation.

Step 3: Finish with Glazed Donut After-Shave Oil + Glow Cream 🍩💦 for that next-level hydration and glow. 

Available @ultabeauty ✨

#TrulyBeauty #TrulySmooth #Halloween #SmoothSkin #Skincare #beauty #ultabeauty
